name: Strong Brain (Klaus Dellano)
description:
Excite your neurons and find out if you would be the patient's salvation or their total destruction.

Is your knowledge enough to have a life in your hands?

  • Strong Brain is a game where your INTELLIGENCE is tested
  • Help your patient to remyelinise their neurons in this questionnaire with MORE THAN 80 QUESTIONS on various areas of neurology such as neuropediatrics and neurosurgery to train, study and entertain.
